title: Client Batches
description: Asynchronous computing with batching on the client-side.

title: Client Worker [w1]
description: Using single Web Worker on the client-side for the computing.

title: Client Workers [w5]
description: Using 5 Web Workers (batching) on the client-side for the computing.

title: Client Service [w1.5]
description: Using master Web Worker and 5 slave workers (map-reduce) on the client-side.

title: Server Sync [q3]
description: Sends 3 requests to server for synchronous computing.

title: Server Service [q3 x w1.5]
description: Sends 3 requests to server for computing by using master worker thread and 5 slave threads (map-reduce) for each request.
